product-activation-configuration.EXPIRE_TEXT: There are %d days until the current license expires.
product-activation-configuration.EXPIRE_TEXT_ONE_DAY: There is one day until the current license expires.
product-activation-configuration.EXPIRE_TEXT_LAST_DAY: This is the last day of the current license.
product-activation-configuration.REG_NOTICE:
You must register your product to receive your permanent license keys. If you have a registration card with your product, please register by pressing the "Register Now" button below; otherwise, you can continue to use CodeWarrior Development Studio until it expires by pressing the "Register Later" button.
Contact license@freescale.com if you have any questions.
